actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-16.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to make studies and investigations within its jurisdiction.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to make studies and investigations within its jurisdiction. Requires the committee to submit to the House, not later than January 2, 1975, a report on the activities of that committee during the Congress ending at noon on January 3, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce to make studies and investigations within its jurisdiction.
